fields.name: Unrecognized Value
fields.description: Check if there are extra items in the column not present in the argument list

fields.name: Greater Equal Than
fields.description: Check if all values in a numeric or date column are greater and equal than threshold argument

fields.name: Less Equal Than
fields.description: Check if all values in a numeric or date column are less and equal than threshold argument

fields.name: Count Underscores
fields.description: Check if a column has matched number of underscores

fields.name: Match Regular Expression
fields.description: Check if a column format matches a regular expression
